hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ANNOUNCE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Announce new image on success using Hudson job "Announce new image"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #Create a tar echo "Creating the tar" dname=`dirname $IMAGE_DIR` if [ "$dname" = "/mnt" ] then dname=`dirname $IMAGE_DIR` bname=`basename $IMAGE_DIR` tar -C $dname -cvzf $IMAGE_DIR.tgz $bname else tar -cvzf $IMAGE_DIR.tgz $IMAGE_DIR fi if [ "$ANNOUNCE" = "yes" ] then curl http://localhost:8888/job/Announce%20new%20image/buildWithParameters?IMAGE_NAME=$IMAGE_DIR fi
